name: parcel
detailedDescription:
The label's smudged and it's hard to tell who it's from or to.
With a bit of creative deciphering (clever you!) it really does look like it's addressed to '$player' but you're not expecting anything.
Maybe John had you mixed up with someone else.

attributes.smell: Mmmm it smells of fresh coffee.

inventory.name: bag
inventory.detailedDescription: The label says 'Finest Software Development Coffee Beans'

attributes.smell: You can almost taste the coffee beans.
